thread.title: Amid tensions, White House proceeds with NK plan

title: Amid tensions, White House proceeds with NK plan
text:
Amid tensions, White House proceeds with NK plan Thursday, May 17, 2018 - 01:24
The White House said on Thursday that it was moving forward with plans for a summit meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore on June 12, despite North Korea's threat to pull out of the summit if the U.S. insists it give up its nuclear program.
